title: Sterlite Power bags projects worth Rs 2,500 crore in Q4
description: Sterlite Power reports a successful fiscal year FY24, with new orders worth Rs 2,500 crore in Q4 driving 35% YoY growth. The company focuses on global demand for power infrastructure supporting renewable energy integration and signs key contracts.
